attributes.action: Bar the Westboro Baptist Church from the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Westboro Baptist Church carries out protests and pickets against the funerals of gay men and women, victims of AIDS, and military personnel who have died in Iraq and Afghanistan.  They promote hatred and should not be allowed into the UK to spread this hatred.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
